承.definition: to bear; to carry; to hold; to continue; to undertake; to take charge; owing to; due to; to receive

承上起下.definition: to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition; forming a bridge between earlier and later stages

承乏.definition: to accept a position on a provisional basis, in the absence of better qualified candidates (humble expr.)

承做.definition: to undertake; to take on (i.e. to accept a task)

承先啟後.definition: see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]

承兌.definition: (commerce) to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment); to honor (a check, a promise)

承前啟後.definition: to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition; forming a bridge between earlier and later stages

承受.definition: to bear; to support; to inherit

承平.definition: (successive periods of) peace and prosperity; peaceful

承德.definition: see 承德市[Cheng2de2 Shi4]; see 承德縣|承德县[Cheng2de2 Xian4]

承德市.definition: Chengde, prefecture-level city in Hebei Province 河北省[He2bei3 Sheng3]

承德縣.definition: Chengde county in Chengde 承德[Cheng2 de2], Hebei

承想.definition: (often used in the negative) to anticipate; to expect; to think that sth would happen

承托.definition: to support; to bear (a weight); to prop up

承接.definition: to receive; to accept; to carry on

承攬.definition: to contract for an entire project

承望.definition: to expect (often in negative combination, I never expected...); to look forward to

承歡.definition: to cater to sb to make them happy (esp. of one's parents)

承當.definition: to bear (responsibility); to take on; to assume

承租方.definition: borrower; leaser; the hiring side of a contract

承籍.definition: to inherit a rank (from a predecessor)

承繼.definition: adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son); to inherit

承蒙關照.definition: to be indebted to sb for care; thank you for looking after me

承襲.definition: to inherit; to follow; to adopt

承認.definition: to admit; to concede; to recognize; recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc); to acknowledge

承諾.definition: to promise; to undertake to do something; commitment

承讓.definition: you let me win (said politely after winning a game)

承載.definition: to bear the weight; to sustain

承轉.definition: to transmit a document (up or down a chain of bureaucracy)

承辦.definition: to undertake; to accept a contract

承運.definition: to provide transport; to accept the Mandate of Heaven; to acknowledge one's calling to be emperor

承重.definition: (usu. of a structural component of a building) to bear a load; load-bearing (wall, pillar etc)

承重孫.definition: eldest grandson (to sustain upper storeys of ancestor worship)

承銷.definition: to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing); underwriting; to sell as agent; consignee

承順.definition: to comply with; to submit to
